atomic_t vob_mmap_cnt
 Number of outstanding mmaps on this file.
unsigned int vob_discard_page_warned:1
 various flags vob_discard_page_warned if pages belonging to this object are discarded when a client is evicted, some debug info will be printed, this flag will be set during processing the first discarded page, then avoid flooding debug message for lots of discarded pages.

Detailed Description

VPP-private object state.

struct cl_object vvp_object::vob_cl [read]

Definition at line 219 of file vvp_internal.h.

Referenced by cl2vvp(), lu2vvp(), vvp_object_alloc(), and vvp_object_init0().

unsigned int vvp_object::vob_discard_page_warned

various flags vob_discard_page_warned if pages belonging to this object are discarded when a client is evicted, some debug info will be printed, this flag will be set during processing the first discarded page, then avoid flooding debug message for lots of discarded pages.

See also:
ll_dirty_page_discard_warn.

Definition at line 233 of file vvp_internal.h.

Referenced by dirty_cnt(), ll_vm_close(), ll_vm_open(), and vvp_object_print().

atomic_t vvp_object::vob_transient_pages

Number of transient pages.

This is no longer protected by i_sem, and needs to be atomic. This is not actually used for anything, and can probably be removed.

Definition at line 227 of file vvp_internal.h.

Referenced by vvp_object_init0(), vvp_object_print(), vvp_page_init(), and vvp_transient_page_fini().
